translations: 拘泥小节；为琐事费时；挑剔

sentences.sentence: He gets the occasional niggle in his right shoulder.
sentences.translation: 他的右肩有时感到轻微的疼痛。

sentences.sentence: I don't react anymore when opponents try to niggle me.
sentences.translation: 当反对者试图对我吹毛求疵时，我不再回应了。

sentences.sentence: The life we have built together is more important than any minor niggle either of us might have.
sentences.translation: 我们共同建立的生活比你我各自可能会有的任何琐碎事更重要。
